Package org.apache.drill.exec.store.parquet

Class BaseParquetMetadataProvider

java.lang.Object
org.apache.drill.exec.store.parquet.BaseParquetMetadataProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
ParquetMetadataProvider, TableMetadataProvider
Direct Known Subclasses:
DeltaParquetTableMetadataProvider, HiveParquetTableMetadataProvider, ParquetTableMetadataProviderImpl
public abstract class BaseParquetMetadataProvider extends Object implements ParquetMetadataProvider
Implementation of ParquetMetadataProvider which contains base methods for obtaining metadata from parquet statistics.

    • init

      protected void init(BaseParquetMetadataProvider metadataProvider) throws IOException
      Throws:
      IOException

    • initializeMetadata

      public void initializeMetadata()
      Method which initializes all metadata kinds to get rid of parquetTableMetadata. Once deserialization and serialization from/into metastore classes is done, this method should be removed to allow lazy initialization.
